name: 09/11 attack!
description:
Your have a plane what you control with WASD and a turret over the twin tower what you control with Mouse. If all Planes get destroyed it go next wave, in every wave you can upgrade your plane with money, to get money destroy/hit others planes.

The objective is hit one of twins towers first, to do it you will need destroy others planes! When someone win the game it restarts
